text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @GovMurphy Just like the 15 COVID-19 cases would disappear in days and that would reflect what a GREAT job you did. 7 weeks later 1 million Americans infected and 60,000+ dead. Hell of a job, Toddler in Chief!
